("HIG") (together with its subsidiaries, “The Hartford”, the “Company”, “we”, or “our”) is a holding company for a group of subsidiaries that provide property and casualty ("P&C") insurance, employee group benefits insurance and services, and mutual funds and exchange-traded funds ("ETF") to individual and business customers in the United States, as well as in the United Kingdom and other international locations. Previously known as The Hartford Financial Services Group, Inc., the Company changed its name to The Hartford Insurance Group, Inc. on February 6, 2025.
